                                   int nClasses,
                                   boolean es_train)

        Creates a local rule

        Parameters:
        tst - the test example
        numItst - the position of the example in the set
        trn - the train example
        numItrn - the position of the example in the set
        clase - the consequent of the rule
        nClasses - the total number of classes
        es_train - identify if it is a training process.
        Returns:
        a local rule
